attributes.action: Advice and Support for Women with Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
attributes.additional_details:
Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS) is a condition that affects thousands of women in the UK. The symptoms of the condition can affect women not only physically (excess hair growth, acne, hair loss) but also mentally (fertility problems, issues with weight loss).

I propose a strong support network available to all women diagnosed with PCOS (offered at the point of diagnosis), including free help and advice and an ongoing councelling service.
